name: AControlRigShapeActor
doc: An actor used to represent a rig control

StaticMeshComponent: this is visual representation of the transform

methods.name: IsEnabled
methods.doc: Get whether the control is enabled/disabled

methods.name: IsHovered
methods.doc: Get whether the control is hovered

methods.name: IsSelectedInEditor
methods.doc: Get whether the control is selected/unselected

methods.name: OnEnabledChanged
methods.doc: Event called when the enabled state of this control has changed

methods.name: OnHoveredChanged
methods.doc: Event called when the hovered state of this control has changed

methods.name: OnManipulatingChanged
methods.doc: Event called when the manipulating state of this control has changed

methods.name: OnSelectionChanged
methods.doc: Event called when the selection state of this control has changed

methods.name: OnTransformChanged
methods.doc: Event called when the transform of this control has changed

methods.name: SetEnabled
methods.doc: Set the control to be enabled/disabled

methods.name: SetGlobalTransform
methods.doc:
this returns root component transform based on attach
when there is no attach, it is based on 0

methods.name: SetHovered
methods.doc: Set the control to be hovered

methods.name: SetSelectable
methods.doc: Set the control to be selected/unselected

methods.name: SetSelected
methods.doc: Set the control to be selected/unselected
